page.title: 06Farm Implements & Tools
page.content: A man in Offord Cluny has collected old{agricultural machines}& local articles of interest. He keeps them in a huge barn.There are things from farms,the old station,the mill,the church,the school & the cobbler's shop.The first moment you step in you see{carts}& old fashioned{shoes,}old {football boots}&{sewing-machines.}It is very interesting.There is an old tool section where you can find{files, {hammers,sledge hammers&old knives}& if you walk to the back you can see{rakes and{spades}of all kinds. There is a very long spade which was used to dig out deep roots. If you look behind, you can see two{tractors}and some {trailers.}You can see an old school {desk}&{ink pots.}You can spend many happy hours there.
